item.description:
Downtown Hartford 5K course, great volunteer support, and a spectacular finish inside the State Armory.

This event is open to runners and walkers of all ages. Plus, special military divisions for Army, Air, Marines, Navy and Coast Guard and a Fun Run for Kids.

Come catch the spirit and pageantry of this special event. All proceeds benefit the Connecticut National Guard Foundation, Inc.

Directions & Parking

The State Armory is located at 360 Broad Street in Hartford adjacent to the Legislative Office Building (LOB).

Parking is free and located across the street from the Armory in the open lot at the corner of Broad Street and Capitol Avenue.
item.name: Freedom Run 5K
